import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import Header from"../components/Header";import"../styles/Dashboard.css";import{FaImage}from"react-icons/fa";import{get_project_data}from"../services/proposal_service";// <-- new function
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function AllProjectsPage(){const navigate=useNavigate();const[projects,setProjects]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchProjects=async()=>{try{const projectData=await get_project_data();setProjects(projectData);}catch(err){console.error("Failed to fetch projects",err);}};fetchProjects();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{className:"dashboard-wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"dashboard-container",children:projects.map(project=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProjectCard,{project:project,onClick:()=>navigate("/project_details/",{state:{project_id:project.project_id}})},project.project_id))})]});}function ProjectCard(_ref){let{project,onClick}=_ref;const[imgError,setImgError]=React.useState(false);const isImageValid=project.link_image&&project.link_image.trim()!==""&&!imgError;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("article",{className:"proposal-card",onClick:onClick,children:[isImageValid?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:project.link_image,onError:()=>setImgError(true),alt:project.title,className:"proposal-image"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"proposal-image fallback-icon",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaImage,{size:48,color:"#aaa"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"proposal-title",children:project.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"proposal-summary",children:project.description})]});}
